titleStmt.title: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew: surely they are disquieted in vain he heapeth up riches and knoweth not who shall gather them, Psal.39.6.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the year 1700. And are to be sold unto such who will receive the love of truth that they might be saved.]

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of advertisement.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
